description: It was quick and clean, however only being able to block advertisements with a host file means it's not ready yet. Support of third party add-ons is a must in this day and age
summary: Fast & Clean browser, but needs add-on support

description: This is like Firefox Focus but for the desktop! It's off to a great start.
Running Ephemeral in Fedora 30's beta, the theme is broken, some icons aren't found, and the webpages themselves load a little slower, like Epiphany.
summary: the pitfalls of WebkitGTK and a broken design outside elementary OS

description: Trying this out in Fedora 31, and one of the icons in the toolbar is missing.
summary: Great Browser, slightly broken outside of elementary

description:
Ephemeral is a paid app design for Elementary OS. 
https://appcenter.elementary.io/com.github.cassidyjames.ephemeral/

Not for video/html5, complex apps/sites ... Otherwise, seems ok ... I like the privacy/anti-tracking, but function lack and $9paid/moral costs may be too high? maybe?
summary: Paid app for Elementary OS, no youtube

description: I love the idea of webkit based browers especially the benefits they give like not being chromium based and having fast page loading in alot of cases, but one thing these browers need is feactures that will draw people from chromium based browers like more power to customize the look and feel also more features thatll ether allow extensions or try to make up for not having them.
user_display: first time user not in elementary

description: The project seemed really interesting but it keeps crashing on my Fedora 39 KDE Plasma.
a violet stain in the world.
summary: This browser is like its icon

description: I like the philosophy endorsed by this browser. Unfortunately it crashes immediatley whenever I try to launch it. Keep up the work 👍

Original developer of this app, here! Welp, today I discovered Fedora packaged this app that I last updated three years ago and marked as EOL over two years ago. To be clear, this app is NOT maintained, NOT secure, and not even working on Fedora 40 for me.

Please do not try to use this app, it is super outdated and probably contains multiple vulnerabilities if you can even get it to run. Instead, I recommend you use the GNOME Web Flatpak and turn on the "Start in Incognito Mode" preference for a similar experience.
Vom Design her mag der Browser zwar Top sein, jedoch gibts es keinen Adblocker und reCaptcha funktioniert auch nicht :/

Läßt sich starten.
Das war es dann aber auch, egal, was eingegeben wird, es geschieht absolut nichts. So anonym wollte ich jetzt auch wieder nicht surfen.
En Fedora KDE Spin 39, instalo esta aplicación y cuando trato de arrancarla, se cierra. No funciona.
при запуске приложение вешает намертво всю операционную систему, Fedora Workstation 30.
При вводе сайта в адресную строку не реагирует на ентер и не переходит по ссылке
